recommendations.title: Topical Retinoid
recommendations.description: Apply a thin layer of adapalene or tretinoin to the affected areas at night. Start with a low concentration and gradually increase as tolerated. Use sunscreen during the day.

recommendations.title: Topical Antibiotic
recommendations.description: Apply clindamycin or erythromycin solution twice daily to reduce inflammation and bacterial load.

recommendations.title: Oral Antibiotic
recommendations.description: Consider oral antibiotics such as doxycycline or minocycline if topical treatments are not sufficient. Consult with a physician for prescription and monitoring.

recommendations.title: Gentle Cleanser
recommendations.description: Use a mild, non-comedogenic cleanser twice daily to avoid irritating the skin.

recommendations.title: Non-Comedogenic Moisturizer
recommendations.description: Apply a light, non-comedogenic moisturizer to maintain skin hydration without clogging pores.

recommendations.title: Sun Protection
recommendations.description: Use a broad-spectrum sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher daily to prevent further damage and hyperpigmentation.
